decision_conditions: The Council considers the relocation of the plant on to the roofs of the permitted extensions to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be granted, subject to the additional conditions below:New Conditions: 28) No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant other than those shown on the approved drawings (including 6470-ECE-01-RF-NMA-A-0171-A - Proposed GA Roof Plan - Mezzanine Rooftop Plant, 6470-ECE-01-RF-NMA-A-0173-B - Proposed GA Roof Plan Zone 1 - Mezzanine Rooftop Plant 6470-ECE-01-XX-NMA-A-0570-B - Consented & Proposed Sections- Mezzanine Rooftop Plant (Sheet 1 of 2), 6470-ECE-01-XX-NMA-A-0571-B - Consented & Proposed Sections- Mezzanine Rooftop Plant (Sheet 2 of 2), 6470 ECE 01 ZZ NMA-A-0460-A Consented and Proposed Elevations -North Elevation Mezzanine Rooftop Plant, 6470-ECE-01-ZZ-N 21 03758 NMA MA-A-0461-A Consented and Proposed Elevations -East Elevation Mezzanine Rooftop Plant, 6470-ECE-01-00-PL-A-0156-D - Proposed Ground Floor Plan)  shall be installed without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties and the visual amenities of the area in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.29) Any conflict between the approved drawings listed in Condition 1 of Planning Permission 19/02368/FUL and Condition 28 as amended by this permission shall be resolved in favour of additional condition 28 for the purposes of roof level plant only.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.30) The noise level determined by the cumulative sound emissions of the plant hereby permitted shall not exceed LAeq,15mins 50dB when measured or predicted 1m externally to the nearest office window of a building outside the application site. Reason: To ensure satisfactory  conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with Policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/02368/FUL (Demolition of single storey entrance and erection of new, two storey entrance building, a new-build multi-purpose space and ground floor infill beneath an existing college building, together with external alterations to the existing first floor windows of the S2 Tower building, associated site access, vehicle and cycle parking and a scheme of external landscaping) dated 26/03/2021. Amendment to consist of relocation of the external ground floor plant on to the roof of the new multi-purpose infill extension and the roof of the two storey entrance building
